summary:
## Summary

The **performance-optimization** session is now complete. I verified all 6 tasks:

### Completed Tasks

1. **add-lazy-loading** ✅ - Lazy loading added to all company logo images
2. **setup-vite-tailwind** ✅ - Tailwind CSS compiled via Vite (10.69KB gzipped vs ~120KB CDN)
3. **add-preload-hints** ✅ - Preconnect and preload hints for fonts, CSS, JS, and Livewire
4. **optimize-company-logos** ✅ - `php artisan logos:optimize` command created
5. **add-pagination** ✅ - SEO-friendly pagination with 25 contracts per page
6. **verify-improvements** ✅ - All improvements verified, tests pass

### Performance Improvements

| Metric | Before | After | Improvement |
|--------|--------|-------|-------------|
| Images | 298 loaded immediately | Lazy loading | ~92% fewer initial loads |
| CSS | Tailwind CDN (~120KB) | Compiled (10.69KB gzipped) | ~91% smaller |
| DOM Elements | ~12,922 per page | ~1,085 per page | ~92% reduction |
| HTML Size | ~2MB per page | ~175KB per page | ~91% reducti
